books.title: Atomic Habits
books.synopsis: An easy & proven way to build good habits and break bad ones.
books.full_description: James Clear explains practical strategies to form habits that stick, with science-backed methods and real-life stories.
books.author: James Clear

books.title: The Alchemist
books.synopsis: A young shepherd embarks on a journey to fulfill his destiny.
books.full_description: Paulo Coelho's spiritual adventure that teaches about listening to your heart and following dreams.
books.author: Paulo Coelho

books.synopsis: A dystopian future ruled by surveillance and oppression.
books.full_description: George Orwell's chilling novel about a totalitarian regime and the power of Big Brother.
books.author: George Orwell

books.title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
books.synopsis: A no-BS guide to living a better life by caring less.
books.full_description: Mark Manson delivers a brutally honest take on happiness, struggles, and finding value in the right things.
books.author: Mark Manson

books.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
books.synopsis: A deep dive into how Homo sapiens came to dominate the Earth.
books.full_description: Yuval Noah Harari explores human history from the Stone Age to the present, blending science, history, and philosophy.
books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
